abstract.p: South Korea's Hyundai Group signs agreement to build industrial complex in Kaesung, North Korea; Hyundai plans to make shoes, textiles and other labor-intensive products at North Korean complex (S)

block.p: South Korea's largest business conglomerate, the Hyundai Group, said it had signed an agreement to build an industrial complex in North Korea. The Hyundai Asan Company, which handles the conglomerate's North Korean business projects, will construct the complex in Kaesung, a city just north of the border, where the conglomerate plans to make shoes, textiles and other labor-intensive products, tapping in to the low labor costs offered there. Hyundai said it planned to share the costs of the multibillion-dollar project through joint ventures.
